name: keepnotes
description: **KeepNotes** is a full-stack note-taking application that allows users to create, read, and manage their personal notes in a clean, responsive UI. Built with the MERN stack and styled using Tailwind CSS, the app offers a seamless experience with features like formatted date display, API-based data fetching, and rate-limit handling.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
